/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by lush greenery on one side and towering buildings on the other. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and grass contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky and the gray of the buildings.
